name: Bing Image Creator Cat
description: Generate images for free using the Bing Image Creator. How to use it? Just add * to the end of your prompt. Example: A colorful drawing of The Cheshire Cat.* Features: Prompt suggestions by the LLM - based on your input, Background image generation - you can continue working with the Cat without waiting the end of the images generation, @tool Image Generation Tool to be used by the LLM - these can be enabled/disabled in the plugin settings. When you Disable/Enable the @tool the plugin itself must be disabled/enabled the changes to take an effect. If you enable the @tool - Background image generation is disabled.
